resume.title: Summary
resume.description: I am a passionate web developer focused on building dynamic, user-centric applications. My journey in web development is driven by a fascination with technology's ability to solve real-world problems. I thrive on challenges and enjoy the process of creating applications that enhance user experiences.

resume.title: Professional Experience
resume.description: I have gained practical experience through internships and projects.

bulletPoints: Developed web applications using PHP and Laravel.
Collaborated with the design team to implement responsive UI.
Participated in code reviews and debugging sessions.
Designed and developed custom websites for local businesses.
Utilized JavaScript and AJAX for interactive features.
Managed project timelines and client communications.

degrees.subtitle: Bachelor in Computer Science and Information Technology (B.Sc.CSIT)
degrees.description: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree focusing on software development and web technologies.
bulletPoints: Gained foundational knowledge in programming languages such as Java, C++, and Python.
Developed skills in web development using PHP, Laravel, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Participated in various projects that emphasized teamwork and problem-solving.
Engaged in workshops and seminars to stay updated on industry trends and technologies.

degrees.subtitle: High School Diploma
degrees.description: Completed my high school education with a strong focus on science and mathematics.
bulletPoints: Achieved excellent grades in science and mathematics subjects.
Participated in extracurricular activities, including coding clubs and science fairs.
Developed critical thinking and analytical skills through various projects.

degrees.subtitle: SLC
bulletPoints: Achieved excellent grades in all subjects.
Participated in school clubs and extracurricular activities.
